metadata.title: CVE-2021-27836 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discoverered in in function xls_getWorkSheet in xls.c in libxls 1.6.2, allows attackers to cause a denial of service, via a crafted XLS file.

criterions.comment: r-cran-readxl package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
